name: AmadorValleyInformationSkill
0:
”Alexa, ask Amador High School when is the first day of school”
”Alexa, Ask Amador High School when is thanksgiving break”
”Alexa, Ask Amador High School who are the counselors”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: amador high school
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill allows users to inquire about Amador Valley High school in Pleasanton CA. The questions you can ask are.
When is the first day of school,
When is the last day of school,
Who are counselors,
Calendar,
When is thanksgiving break,
When is winter break,
When is spring break,
Who are the staff,
What is the dress code.
These can be worded in multiple ways so don't worry about saying the question exactly as stated here.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
